content: I have a Dell XPS laptop, it's about 2 years old, and I've had the battery since I bought it. I use it mostly for web browsing, watching videos, and working on documents. I don't do much gaming. I've noticed that the battery life has been getting worse over time, but I'm not sure if it's because of the battery itself or something else. Also, I've been trying to keep it plugged in as much as possible, but it's still annoying.
